main event: An Air Force pilot reported a sighting of a reddish-orange cross-shaped UFO near Monroe, Louisiana on 22 May 1956.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a C-47 and made an abrupt left turn while changing color from reddish-orange to reddish-white, The length of observation lasted for 1-2 minutes, The pilot had previously seen many types of unknown objects but described this as a new phenomenon, The object was seen flying at high speeds during its maneuvering, Investigations revealed no other aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: U.S. Air Force pilots, experienced with combat missions and flight training.
